_header: In places oft when I him here meet
_description: A love lyric — four cross-rhymed quatrains

CULAdd5943.First Lines:
In places ofte when I hym hyre meteI dar noȝt speke but forth
                    I go speke but forth I go…
CULAdd5943.Last Lines:
…And euer I hope hyt schal be soThen schal I chaunge for no
                    new
CULAdd5943.Editions:
Mayer,  L. S. 
             Music, Cantilenas and Songs.
         London, 1906 (privately printed); by "L. S. M.": 44.
